actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To provide for a temporary partial waiver of the requirement that the States match a portion of the Federal funds provided for the job opportunities and basic skills training program of the States.

summary.text: Provides for a temporary partial waiver of the requirement that States match a portion of the Federal funds provided for the job opportunities and basic skills training program (JOBS program) under provisions for aid to families with dependent children (AFDC) under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: To provide for a temporary partial waiver of the requirement that the States match a portion of the Federal funds provided for the job opportunities and basic skills training program of the States.
